sourcesContent:
import React, { useMemo } from 'react'; import './CartPage.css'; const CartPage = ({ cartItems, onSetCartQuantity, onProceed }) => { // Calculate totals const calculations = useMemo(() => { const itemsTotal = cartItems.reduce( (sum, item) => sum + item.product.price * item.quantity, 0 ); const gst = Math.round(itemsTotal * 0.05); // 5% GST const handlingCharge = 7; const discountSavings = cartItems.reduce((sum, item) => { // assuming original price is higher return sum + item.quantity * 10; // example discount }, 0); const grandTotal = itemsTotal + gst + handlingCharge; return { itemsTotal, gst, handlingCharge, discountSavings, grandTotal, itemCount: cartItems.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.quantity, 0), }; }, [cartItems]); if (cartItems.length === 0) { return (

Your cart is empty

Add items from the shop to get started

); } return (
{/* Left: Items List */}

My Cart

{calculations.itemCount} items

{/* Delivery Info */}

Delivery in 22 minutes

Shipment of {calculations.itemCount} items

{/* Cart Items */}
{cartItems.map((item) => (

{item.product.name}

{item.product.category}

{item.quantity} piece {item.quantity > 1 ? 's' : ''}

₹ {Math.round( item.product.price * item.quantity )}

₹ {Math.round( Math.round(item.product.price * 1.15) * item.quantity )}

{item.quantity}
))}
{/* Cancellation Policy */}

Cancellation Policy

  • Cancel your order anytime before it's out for delivery
  • Refunds will be processed within 24-48 hours
  • Partial cancellations are allowed for orders with multiple items
  • No refund will be provided for orders already delivered
  • For any issues, contact customer support within 7 days of delivery
  • Delivery charges are non-refundable for cancelled orders
  • All refunds will be credited to the original payment method
{/* Right: Bill Summary */}

Your total savings

₹{calculations.discountSavings}

Items total Saved ₹ {Math.round( calculations.discountSavings * 0.8 )}
₹{calculations.itemsTotal} ₹ {Math.round( calculations.itemsTotal + calculations.discountSavings * 0.8 )}
Handling charge ₹{calculations.handlingCharge}
High demand surge charge FREE
GST (5%) ₹{calculations.gst}
Grand total ₹{calculations.grandTotal}

Your total savings

₹{calculations.discountSavings}

); }; export default CartPage;
